response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge as planned in subtask 1. There was no execution error. The next step is to take the kale out of the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the kale out of the fridge
(3) Put the kale into the saucepot
(4) Put the saucepot into the oven
(5) Turn on the oven to cook the kale

def act(robot,env,camera):
